lbl.password_requirements: The password must contain at least 8 characters, one lowercase letter (a-z), one uppercase letter (A-Z), one number (0-9), and one special character.
lbl.passwords_not_match: The old password and the new password must be different.
lbl.password_tab_match: New password and confirm password must be match!
lbl.website_invalid: Website should be a valid URL
lbl.agree_with: By Signing up, you agree to our
lbl.check_spam: Do not forgot to check SPAM box.
lbl.check_email: Check mail for reset password link
lbl.recover_sent: We have sent a password recover instructions to your email.
lbl.dashboard_welcome_message: Analytics provides you with comprehensive and free tools to analyze data for your business, all in one place, empowering you to make informed decisions.
lbl.welcome_ph1: Discover the power of data and transform your business with Analytics, our cutting-edge platform for analyzing and interpreting web information. Whether you're an entrepreneur, marketer, or analytics specialist, Analytics provides you with the necessary tools to gain deep insights into your online audience and make intelligent, informed decisions.
lbl.welcome_ph2: Welcome to the world of Analytics! Discover the power of data and transform your business with Analytics, our cutting-edge platform for analyzing and interpreting web information. Whether you're an entrepreneur, marketer, or analytics specialist, Analytics provides you with the necessary tools to gain a deep understanding of your online audience and make intelligent, informed decisions. With Analytics, you'll be able to track and analyze data streams, user behavior, and conversions to gain detailed insights into your online performance. You'll discover valuable insights, trends, and hidden opportunities, enabling you to take effective measures to improve your marketing strategies, increase user engagement, and maximize your return on investment.
lbl.welcome_ph3: Whether you want to optimize your website, measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, or improve your conversion processes, Analytics is your trusted partner. With an intuitive interface, advanced features, and customizable reports, Analytics provides you with the tools you need to achieve your goals and grow your business.
lbl.welbome_ph4: Start today and take the first step towards a deeper understanding of your online audience. Sign up for Analytics and let the data illuminate your path to success!
lbl.complete_profile: Complete your profile to unlock all features

err.popup_closed_by_user: Error: Login window was closed by the user.
err.popup_blocked: Error: Login window was blocked by the browser.
err.network_request_failed: Error: Login request failed due to a network issue.
err.login_generic_error: Error: An error occurred during login.
err.change_password_generic_error: Error: An error occurred during change password.
err.reset_password_generic_error: Error: An error occurred during password reset.
err.register_generic_error: Error: An error occurred during register.
err.required_relogin: Change password requires recent login. Please log in again.
err.email_already_in_use: Error: Email address aldready in use.
